product_name: Sanuk Plain Jane Shoes - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Sanuk Plain Jane slip-on shoes are a great choice for summer fun. With a simple style, they match any casual outfit. A sandal-shoe hybrid from Sanuk's Sidewalk Surfer line, Plain Jane slip-ons are canvas shoe uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton canvas uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them that well-worn look. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move; side vents let your feet breathe. High-rebound, molded EVA footbeds repel odors with an antimicrobial additive. Happy U sponge-rubber outsoles cushion and grip. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: The Sanuk Plain Jane slip-on shoes are a great choice for summer fun. With a simple style, they match any casual outfit.
